column2: What's this supposed to be? Do you guys sleep here?

column2: Obviously not.

column2: I can't believe this, are you five years old?
column3: Không thể tin nổi, mày trẻ lên 5 à?

column2: Isn't it interesting how electronics work?
column3: Xem cách thức đồ điện vận hành không thấy hứng thú sao?

column2: But they DON'T work! Not anymore!
column3: Nhưng mà giờ HỎNG ĐÈN mất tiêu rồi còn đâu!?

column2: I think you're wasting your breath…

column2:
"Roses are red

"Hoa hồng đỏ thắm

column2:
"My love for you sparkles
Like the glow of a diamond"
column3:
"Yêu em lấp lánh
Như ánh kim cang"

column2:
"I watch you every day
I watch you every night"

"Ngày ngày nhìn em

column2: "I watch you"
column3: "Nhìn em"

column2: That… doesn't sound right.

column2: I'd rather people didn't find out I was here.
column3: Đừng có để lại dấu vết mình có ở đây thì hơn.

column2: Please don't mess up this room…
column3: Làm ơn đừng có phá phách cái phòng này…

column2: I think I'll pass on burning the school down today.

column2: There's no point in brandishing your scissors at them. They're already open.

column2: They are too heavy to use as curtains.
column3: Mà nặng quá không dùng làm rèm được.

column2: There's really no incentive to check out the contents of the trash can.
